H0.text: The Uffizi and the Bargello are among the museums of art in which European city . Rome

H1.text: The Uffizi and the Bargello are among the museums of art in which European city . Venice

H2.text: The Uffizi and the Bargello are among the museums of art in which European city . Milan

H3.text: The Uffizi and the Bargello are among the museums of art in which European city . פירנצה

A4.text: Picture galleries in Florence include the Uffizi and the Palazzo Pitti.

A5.text: The Uffizi Gallery, one of the finest art museums in the world, was founded on a large bequest from the last member of the Medici family. It is located at the corner of Piazza della Signoria, a site important for being the centre of Florence's civil life and government for centuries.
